name: Chabad-Lubavitch
description: Promotes Jewish education, outreach, and community support worldwide.

name: Jewish National Fund (JNF)
description: Supports environmental, community development, and land reclamation projects in Israel.

name: World Jewish Congress
description: Advocates for Jewish interests, human rights, and combating anti-Semitism worldwide.

name: American Jewish Committee (AJC)
description: Works to enhance the well-being of the Jewish people and promote democratic values worldwide.

name: United Jewish Appeal (UJA-Federation)
description: Supports a network of organizations addressing Jewish needs and global challenges.

name: Yad Vashem
description: Commemorates the Holocaust and educates about its history and lessons.

name: Orthodox Union (OU)
description: Promotes Orthodox Judaism and supports Jewish communities through various programs.

name: Hadassah
description: Focuses on healthcare, research, and women's issues in Israel and worldwide.

name: Jewish Federations of North America
description: Supports Jewish communal organizations and social services across North America.

name: Simon Wiesenthal Center
description: Combats anti-Semitism, promotes tolerance, and educates about the Holocaust.

name: Yeshiva University
description: Offers education and research in Orthodox Jewish studies and general academics.

name: Hillel International
description: Supports Jewish student life on college campuses worldwide.

name: Mazon: A Jewish Response to Hunger
description: Works to end hunger among people of all faiths through advocacy and support.

name: B'nai B'rith International
description: Promotes human rights, community service, and interfaith understanding.

name: Jewish Family Service (JFS)
description: Provides social services, mental health, and support to individuals and families.

name: Jewish Theological Seminary (JTS)
description: Offers education and training in Conservative Judaism and Jewish scholarship.

name: Jewish Community Centers (JCC)
description: Supports Jewish community life and wellness through programs and services.

name: American Jewish World Service (AJWS)
description: Advocates for human rights and social justice in the developing world.

name: Jewish Federation of Greater Los Angeles
description: Serves the Jewish community and addresses critical social issues in Los Angeles.

name: Hebrew Free Loan Society
description: Offers interest-free loans to individuals and small businesses in need.
